mapper.select: ${value}
select max(substr(xmbm,-3)) from lxsh_sjgz where xmbm like ${value}||'%'
select max(substr(xmbm,-3)) from lxsh_lmgz where xmbm like ${value}||'%'
select max(substr(xmbm,-3)) from lxsh_xj where xmbm like ${value}||'%'
select bzzj bzys from PLAN_FLWBZBZ where xmlx=#{xmlx} and gldj=#{gldj} and jsdj like #{jsdj}||'%'
select * from LXSH_LX where lxbm=#{ghlxbh} and ((qdzh<=#{qdzh} and zdzh>#{qdzh}) or (qdzh<#{zdzh} and zdzh>=#{zdzh})) and substr(xmid,0,4)=#{xmnf}
select * from LXSH_LX where lxbm=#{ghlxbh} and ((qdzh<=#{qdzh} and zdzh>#{qdzh}) or (qdzh<#{zdzh} and zdzh>=#{zdzh})) and substr(xmid,0,4)=substr(#{xmbm},0,4) and jdbs=#{jdbs}
select * from LXSH_LMGZ where ghlxbh =#{ghlxbh} and ((qdzh<=#{qdzh} and zdzh>#{qdzh}) or (qdzh<#{zdzh} and zdzh>=#{zdzh})) and xmnf=#{xmnf}
select * from LXSH_XJ where ghlxbh =#{ghlxbh} and ((qdzh<=#{qdzh} and zdzh>#{qdzh}) or (qdzh<#{zdzh} and zdzh>=#{zdzh})) and xmnf=#{xmnf}
mapper.insert: insert into lxsh_lx (xmid, lxbm, lxmc, xzqh, xzqhdm, gydw, gydwdm, qdzh, zdzh, jsjsdj, lc, xjsdj, jsxz, qdmc, zdmc, bzcs, sffirst, jdbs,gpsqdzh,gpszdzh,jsfa,xjlxbm,xjqdzh,xjzdzh,xjlc,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc ,jhyilc,jherlc,jhsanlc,jhsilc,jhdwlc,jhwllc) select xmid, lxbm, lxmc, xzqh, xzqhdm, gydw, gydwdm, qdzh, zdzh, jsjsdj, lc, xjsdj, jsxz, qdmc, zdmc, bzcs, sffirst, to_char(to_number(#{jdbs})),gpsqdzh,gpszdzh,jsfa,xjlxbm,xjqdzh,xjzdzh,xjlc,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc ,jhyilc,jherlc,jhsanlc,jhsilc,jhdwlc,jhwllc from lxsh_lx where xmid = #{xmbm} and jdbs=to_char(to_number(#{jdbs})-1)
mapper.select: select t.*,bzcs bzys,xmid xmbm,lxbm ghlxbh from lxsh_lx t where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}

select count(*) from LXSH_LX where 1=1 and sffirst!='1'
and xmid like '%'||#{xmbm}||'%'
and jdbs like '%'||#{jdbs}||'%'
mapper.update: update LXSH_SJGZ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update LXSH_LMGZ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update LXSH_XJ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update LXSH_SJGZ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update LXSH_SJGZ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update LXSH_LMGZ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update LXSH_LMGZ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update LXSH_XJ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update LXSH_XJ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update LXSH_LX set qdzh=#{qdzh},zdzh=#{zdzh},qdmc=#{qdmc},zdmc=#{zdmc},lc=#{lc},jsxz=#{jsxz},jsjsdj=#{jsjsdj},bzcs=#{bzys} where xmid=#{xmbm} and sffirst='1' and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.select: select sum(to_number(bzcs)) from LXSH_LX where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
select sum(to_number(lc)) from LXSH_LX where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.update: update LXSH_SJGZ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
update LXSH_LMGZ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
update LXSH_XJ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from LXSH_SJGZ where ${value}
select * from LXSH_LMGZ where ${value}
select * from LXSH_XJ where ${value}
select * from kxxyj_lmgz where 1=1 and ${value} and sbthcd is not null
select * from kxxyj_sjgz where 1=1 and ${value} and sbthcd is not null
select * from kxxyj_xj where 1=1 and ${value} and sbthcd is not null
select lxbm ghlxbh,lxmc,qdzh,zdzh,qzlc lc,qdmc,zdmc,yjsdj xjsdj from table(funNoLmlx(#{ghlxbh},#{xzqh})) order by lxbm,qdzh
mapper.update: update lxsh_sjgz set bzys=#{bzys},lc=#{lc},dfzc=(tz-#{bzys}) where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update lxsh_lmgz set bzys=#{bzys},lc=#{lc},dfzc=(tz-#{bzys}) where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update lxsh_xj set bzys=#{bzys},lc=#{lc},dfzc=(tz-#{bzys}) where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.delete: delete from lxsh_lx where xmid=#{xmbm} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select min(f006) qdmc from gpsroad g, (SELECT MIN(ABS(ROADSTART- to_number(#{qdzh}))) a FROM gpsroad where SUBSTR(roadcode,1,4) = #{ghlxbh}) t where SUBSTR(g.roadcode,1,4) = #{ghlxbh} and (g.roadstart=to_number(#{qdzh})+t.a or g.roadstart=to_number(#{qdzh})-t.a )

select min(f010) zdmc from gpsroad g, (SELECT MIN(ABS(ROADENDS-to_number(#{qdzh}))) a FROM gpsroad where SUBSTR(roadcode,1,4) = #{ghlxbh}) t where SUBSTR(g.roadcode,1,4) = #{ghlxbh} and (g.ROADENDS=to_number(#{qdzh})+t.a or g.ROADENDS=to_number(#{qdzh})-t.a )
mapper.delete: delete from lxsh_lx where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs='1'
mapper.select: select * from lxsh_lx where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs='0' and sffirst='1'
select count(*) shzt from lxsh_lx where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs} and sffirst='0'
select gpsqdzh qdzh,gpszdzh zdzh from lxsh_lx where lxbm=#{ghlxbh} and xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs='0' and sffirst='1'
select * from lxsh_lx where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}

select t.xmbm v_0,t.xmmc v_1,lx.xzqh v_2,lx.qdzh v_3,lx.zdzh v_4,'升级改造' v_5,t.dq_m v_6,t.dq v_7,t.jsjsdj v_8,t.sd_m v_9,t.sd v_10,t.jsdw v_11,t.kgny v_12,t.wgny v_13,t.bzdw v_14,t.tzgs v_15,t.gkpfwh v_16,t.pfsj v_17 from KXXYJ_SJGZ t left join (select * from lxsh_lx where 1=1 and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1') lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid where 1=1
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and xmbm like #{xmnf}||'%'
and tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and xjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'
and lsjl like '%'||#{lsjl}||'%'

select t.xmbm v_0,t.xmmc v_1,lx.xzqh v_2,lx.qdzh v_3,lx.zdzh v_4,'路面改造' v_5,t.dq_m v_6,t.dq v_7,t.jsjsdj v_8,t.sd_m v_9,t.sd v_10,t.jsdw v_11,t.kgny v_12,t.wgny v_13,t.bzdw v_14,t.tzgs v_15,t.gkpfwh v_16,t.pfsj v_17 from KXXYJ_LMGZ t left join (select * from lxsh_lx where 1=1 and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1') lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid where 1=1
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and xmbm like #{xmnf}||'%'
and tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and xjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'
and lsjl like '%'||#{lsjl}||'%'

select t.xmbm v_0,t.xmmc v_1,lx.xzqh v_2,lx.qdzh v_3,lx.zdzh v_4,'新建' v_5,t.dq_m v_6,t.dq v_7,t.jsjsdj v_8,t.sd_m v_9,t.sd v_10,t.jsdw v_11,t.kgny v_12,t.wgny v_13,t.bzdw v_14,t.tzgs v_15,t.gkpfwh v_16,t.pfsj v_17 from KXXYJ_XJ t left join (select * from lxsh_lx where 1=1 and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1') lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid where 1=1
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and xmbm like #{xmnf}||'%'
and tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and xjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'
and lsjl like '%'||#{lsjl}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into LXSH_SJGZ( id,lxmc,xmmc,ghlxbh,lc,jsxz,qdzh,zdzh,qdmc,zdmc,jhkgn,jhwgn,jsjsdj,xjsdj,xmbm,tz,bzys,dfzc,xzqh,gydw,xzqhdm,gydwdm,xmnf,sbthcd,tbbmbm) values(sys_guid(),#{2},#{3},#{1},to_char(to_number(#{5})-to_number(#{4})),#{8},#{4},#{5},#{6},#{7},#{14},#{15},#{12},#{13},#{xmbm},#{16},#{bzys},to_char(to_number(#{16})-to_number(#{bzys})),#{10},#{9},(select id from XTGL_XZQH where trim(name) = #{10}),(select id from XTGL_DEPARTMENT where trim(name) = #{9}),substr(#{xmbm},0,4),'9',(select id from XTGL_DEPARTMENT where trim(name) = #{9}))

insert into LXSH_LMGZ( id,lxmc,xmmc,ghlxbh,lc,jsxz,qdzh,zdzh,qdmc,zdmc,jhkgn,jhwgn,jsjsdj,xjsdj,xmbm,tz,bzys,dfzc,xzqh,gydw,xzqhdm,gydwdm,xmnf,sbthcd,tbbmbm) values(sys_guid(),#{2},#{3},#{1},to_char(to_number(#{5})-to_number(#{4})),#{8},#{4},#{5},#{6},#{7},#{14},#{15},#{12},#{13},#{xmbm},#{16},#{bzys},to_char(to_number(#{16})-to_number(#{bzys})),#{10},#{9},(select id from XTGL_XZQH where trim(name) = #{10}),(select id from XTGL_DEPARTMENT where trim(name) = #{9}),substr(#{xmbm},0,4),'9',(select id from XTGL_DEPARTMENT where trim(name) = #{9}))

insert into LXSH_XJ( id,lxmc,xmmc,ghlxbh,lc,jsxz,qdzh,zdzh,qdmc,zdmc,jhkgn,jhwgn,jsjsdj,xjsdj,xmbm,tz,bzys,dfzc,xzqh,gydw,xzqhdm,gydwdm,xmnf,sbthcd,tbbmbm) values(sys_guid(),#{2},#{3},#{1},to_char(to_number(#{5})-to_number(#{4})),#{8},#{4},#{5},#{6},#{7},#{14},#{15},#{12},#{13},#{xmbm},#{16},#{17},to_char(to_number(#{16})-to_number(#{17})),#{10},#{9},(select id from XTGL_XZQH where trim(name) = #{10}),(select id from XTGL_DEPARTMENT where trim(name) = #{9}),substr(#{xmbm},0,4),'9',(select id from XTGL_DEPARTMENT where trim(name) = #{9}))

insert into LXSH_LX(id,xmid,lxbm,lxmc,xzqh,xzqhdm,gydw,gydwdm,qdzh,zdzh,jsjsdj,lc,xjsdj,jsxz,qdmc,zdmc,bzcs,sffirst,jdbs,gpsqdzh,gpszdzh) values(sys_guid(),#{xmbm},#{1},#{2},#{10},(select id from XTGL_XZQH where trim(name) = #{10}),#{9},(select id from XTGL_DEPARTMENT where trim(name) = #{9}),#{6},#{7},#{12},to_char(to_number(#{5})-to_number(#{4})),#{13},#{8},#{6},#{7},#{bzys},'1','0',#{4},#{5})
mapper.select: select t.* from xtgl_wqbzbz t order by decode(t.bzjb,'省级',1,'市级',2),decode(t.qllx,'特大桥',1,'大桥',2,'中桥',3,'小桥',4),decode(t.jsxz,'拆除重建',1,'加固改造',2)
